name: Big Spender
description: Buy everything you can from your house.

name: Way to go, Romeo
description: Marry the first girl you meet.

name: Good Dad
description: Be best friends with all your heirs.

name: You're Over-Overflowing
description: Spend your whole career in overflow.

name: You're Sodai Gomi Now
description: Spend over 90% of your waking hours at work.

name: Tired
description: Spend 5 years getting too little sleep.

name: The Power of Friendship
description: Become friends with your boss at each promotion level.

name: Prodigy
description: Get promoted in your first week on the job.

name: So Now That You've Retired, Are You Moving Out?
description: Never move out from your parent's house.

name: Where'd The Money Go???
description: Retire with less than 10,000 yen in your bank account.

name: F Is For Friends
description: Make at least 15 friends in one life.

name: EZ Game
description: Submit a successful Work Project without revising it.
